english.segment1: You traded riches to run to my rescue. Oh, my redeemer. You take the pieces and turn them to praises. Oh, my Redeemer. Oh, my Redeemer
english.segment2: Love I cannot deny. Sure as the morning light. Jesus, my Redeemer
english.segment3: You paid my ransom. You chose to suffer. Oh, my Redeemer. Oh, my Redeemer
english.segment4: Love I cannot deny. Sure as the morning light. Jesus, my Redeemer. Now I am not ashamed. To You be the highest praise. Jesus, my Redeemer. My Redeemer
english.segment5: No other one so glorious. You outshine the sun. No other love like Jesus. You outshine the sun
